DS1-Who.text:
I don't fully understand it myself.

I just know that I'm connected to you in some way, that I know things about this place that you don't, and that the deer doesn't want me talking to you.

DS1D-Babysitter.text:
Haha yeah he has no idea what he's doing.

It's like he read Alice in Wonderland and thought that was how you're supposed to take care of kids.

replies.text: So why is he taking care of me?

D-Explanations.text:
I know, right?

He's so cryptic!

replies.text: Would you happen to have any explanations?

S-Who.text:
I'll answer your question with another question: 

Where do you think we are?

replies.text: It looks like some kind of forest
That's what I've been trying to figure out!

DS3-Limit.text:
But that's two questions.  That's all the time we have.

We can talk later, though.  you'll find me around.

Oh, and here's some chamomile[give chamomile].  I know how the deer loves his tea.

(- There is now Chamomile in your pocket -)

Now shoo!

H.text:
Well, he and I don't get along very well.

[event deer]But it's fine if you're friends with him!

S-Forest.text:
Yes.

It looks like a forest, though it clearly isn't.

We're in some sort of imitation.

Talked.text: Hi!  Did you want to talk some more?

replies.text: I was wondering if you could explain some things.  The deer is dodging my questions.
No, I was just checking in.

DS2-Babysitter.text: Whoever's running this thing is trying to keep your mind off something.  The outside world, I guess.

Knowledge.text:
If the deer asks, you don't anything about me.

Have a nice day!!

DS2-Something.text:
I don't know exactly.  I'm not even sure if they're human.

I just know that they aren't good.  

I remember your fear.

DS-Knowledge.text:
I'll try my best, but we shouldn't take too long or the deer will suspect something.

If he finds out I'm here, he'll probably throw me into the incomprehensible void.

So I'll only let you ask TWO questions.[give forbidden_knowledge]

DS1-Deer.text:
I think he's your caretaker or something.  Like a babysitter.

He's trying to keep you occupied and relaxed.

replies.text: He's not doing a very good job.
Why?  What does he gain from that?

DS1-How.text:
I don't know, but you didn't come here voluntarily.

Someone or something brought you here.

DS1-Where.text:
We're in some kind of simulation.

I don't know what the purpose of it is; your memories are being masked by something.

replies.text: How would you know that my memories are masked?

DS-Questions.text:
Boy you really wasted your first question.

We only have so much time before the deer gets suspicious, so I decided two questions was good enough.

Okay, but I'll give you two more because that was just a complete waste of a question.

Home.text:
Hello!

Did that mean old deer make you come out here?

replies.text: Yeah, and he won't explain anything.

DS2-Memories.text:
I can see into your mind, even the areas you can't see, yourself.

For example, I can see that there are memories you can't access for some reason.  None of the memories are very clear, but I can see they're there.

I don't know why I can do this, exactly.  I think I might be a part of your unconscious brain that was separated from you when you were brought into the simulation.
